description:
March 14th is White Day, when men who received chocolates on Valentine`s Day are supposed to give back thank-you gifts. Douki-chan is hopeful that she`ll get one from Douki-kun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Coworker Who Was Looking Forward to a White Day Gift...
White Day ni Kitai Shite Ita Kaisha no Douki...
ホワイトデーに期待していた会社の同期...
